name: The Last Stand (Gw1p)
description:
The Last Stand is a game where you get a choice of playing as a warrior, mage or rogue with every class having unique mechanics. Be ready to face countless waves of monsters, which will keep attacking you till you are dead!

I hope you enjoy this little RPG of mine. If you do, please leave a comment down below, send an e-mail: gw1p@mail.ru or tweet me @AntonGw1p
